gameMsgFormInfo.text: Welcome to the Zoll defibrilator trainer.

arguments.string: label=instructionsText text="Welcome to Medstar's Zoll defibrilator trainer. This trainer will take you through the steps required to test the Zoll. Please follow through the instructions for delivering a shock to the patient."
label=instructionsText text="The test connectors must be connected for the Zoll testing. Click on the flashing connectors on the right side of the Zoll to make the connection"
label=contentText text="Connectors are now connected. Good Job."
label=contentText text="Test connectors aren't connected, try again!

ScriptedActionInfo.unityObjectName: Ask user to turn knob to Defib

gameMsgFormInfo.text: Please put the Zoll in Defib mode.
gameMsgFormInfo.title: Select Defib Mode

arguments.string: label=instructionsText text="Please click the upper most knob on the simulator to move the dial to the defib position. This simulates selecting defib mode on the actual simulator."

gameMsgFormInfo.text: Zoll is now in DEFIB Mode
gameMsgFormInfo.title: Correct

arguments.string: label=contentText text="Zoll is now in DEFIB Mode."

gameMsgFormInfo.text: Not in DEBIB Mode. Click the flashing dial to switch modes.
gameMsgFormInfo.title: ERROR

arguments.string: label=contentText text="Zoll not in DEFIB mode. Please try again."

gameMsgFormInfo.text: Please set the energy level to 30 joules
gameMsgFormInfo.title: Set to 30 Joules

arguments.string: label=instructionsText text="Please set the energy level to 30 joules. Press the up/down arrows on the Energy Select panel to increase and decrease the energy level. Notice that the current energy level is displayed on the Zoll user panel."
label=contentText text="Zoll energy is set to 30 Joules."
label=contentText text="Either Joules or Defib mode not set correctly. Please recheck settings."

gameMsgFormInfo.text: Press the charge button to charge the Zoll
gameMsgFormInfo.title: Press Charge Button

arguments.string: label=instructionsText text="Press the charge button to charge the Zoll. Once the Zoll is charged to the requested enegy level the Shock button will illuminate."
label=contentText text="Zoll is charged and ready to shock."
label=contentText text="Zoll not charged. Please press the charge button."

gameMsgFormInfo.text: Zoll is charged. Press the shock button to deliver the shock.
gameMsgFormInfo.title: Press Shock Button

arguments.string: label=instructionsText text="Zoll is charged. Press the shock button to deliver the shock."

gameMsgFormInfo.text: Great job, shock has been delivered. You have completed the basic steps to deliver a shock.
gameMsgFormInfo.title: Shock Delivered

arguments.string: label=contentText text="Great job, shock has been delivered. You have completed the basic steps to deliver a shock."
label=contentText text="Shock not delivered. Please press the shock button."

gameMsgFormInfo.text: You have successfully completed the Zoll training...
gameMsgFormInfo.title: Congrats!

arguments.string: label=contentText text="You have successfully completed the Zoll training."

gameMsgFormInfo.text: Welcome to the Zoll defibrilator trainer.

arguments.string: label=instructionsText text="Welcome to Medstar's Zoll defibrilator trainer. This trainer will take you through the steps required to test the Zoll. Please follow through the instructions for delivering a shock to the patient."

ScriptedActionInfo.comment: call init to turn the display back off
